trans-unit.source: Neil's answer is by far the best one. However things get messy really fast. My suggestion would be to use variables to store elements and append them to the DOM hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: 尼尔的答案是迄今为止最好的答案。但是事情很快就会变得混乱。我的建议是使用变量存储元素，并将其附加到DOM层次结构中。

trans-unit.source: index is an integer that specifies the position of the row to insert (starts at 0). The value of -1 can also be used; which result in that the new row will be inserted at the last position.
trans-unit.target: index 是一个整数，指定要插入的行的位置（从0开始）。也可以使用值-1。结果是新行将被插入到最后一个位置。

trans-unit.source: Update: Revisiting this answer following recent activity with this question. eyelidlessness makes a good comment that there will always be a tbody in the DOM; this is true, but only if there is at least one row. If you have no rows, there will be no tbody unless you have specified one yourself.
trans-unit.target: 更新：在最近对该问题进行的活动之后，重新访问此答案。eyelidlessness使一个很好的评价是，将永远是一个 tbody 在DOM; 这是正确的，但前提是至少有一行。如果没有行，除非您自己指定一个，否则不会有任何 tbody 。

trans-unit.source: As i have also got a way too add row at last or any specific place so i think i should also share this:
trans-unit.target: 由于我也有一个方法,在最后或任何特定的地方添加行,所以我想我也应该分享这个。

trans-unit.source: DaRKoN_ suggests appending to the tbody rather than adding content after the last tr. This gets around the issue of having no rows, but still isn't bulletproof as you could theoretically have multiple tbody elements and the row would get added to each of them.
trans-unit.target: DaRKoN_ 建议追加到 tbody ,而不要在最后一个 tr 之后添加内容。这解决了没有行的问题，但是仍然不是防弹的，因为理论上您可以有多个 tbody 元素，并且行会添加到每个元素中。

trans-unit.source: Expand snippet
trans-unit.target: 扩展片段

trans-unit.source: First find out the length or rows:
trans-unit.target: 先找出长度或行数。

trans-unit.source: For the best solution posted here, if there's a nested table on the last row, the new row will be added to the nested table instead of the main table. A quick solution (considering tables with/without tbody and tables with nested tables):
trans-unit.target: 对于这里发布的最佳解决方案,如果最后一行有一个嵌套表,那么新的行将被添加到嵌套表中,而不是主表。一个快速的解决方案(考虑到有TODY的表和有嵌套表的表)。

trans-unit.source: Hence the best solution is to include a <tbody> tag and use .append, rather than .after.
trans-unit.target: 因此，最好的解决方案是包含一个 <tbody> 标记并使用 .append 而不是 .after 。

trans-unit.target: 下面是一个用法的例子。

trans-unit.target: 这是演示 小提琴

trans-unit.source: Here is some hacketi hack code. I wanted to maintain a row template in an HTML page. Table rows 0...n are rendered at request time, and this example has one hardcoded row and a simplified template row. The template table is hidden, and the row tag must be within a valid table or browsers may drop it from the DOM tree. Adding a row uses counter+1 identifier, and the current value is maintained in the data attribute. It guarantees each row gets unique URL parameters.
trans-unit.target: 这是一些hacketi hack代码。我想在HTML页面中维护行模板。表行0 ... n在请求时呈现，并且此示例具有一个硬编码行和一个简化的模板行。模板表是隐藏的，并且行标记必须在有效表中，否则浏览器可能会将其从DOM树中删除。添加一行使用counter + 1标识符，并且当前值保留在data属性中。它保证每一行都获得唯一的URL参数。

trans-unit.target: 我发现此AddRow插件对于管理表行非常有用。但是，如果您只需要添加新行，那么Luke的解决方案将是最合适的。

trans-unit.source: I have run tests on Internet Explorer 8, Internet Explorer 9, Firefox, Chrome, Opera, Nokia Lumia 800, Nokia C7 (with Symbian 3), Android stock and Firefox beta browsers.

trans-unit.source: I think the safest solution is probably to ensure your table always includes at least one tbody in your markup, even if it has no rows. On this basis, you can use the following which will work however many rows you have (and also account for multiple tbody elements):
trans-unit.target: 我认为最安全的解决方案可能是确保您的 table 在标记中始终至少包含一个 tbody ，即使它没有行也是如此。在此基础上，您可以使用以下代码，无论您拥有多少行（并且也考虑了多个 tbody 元素），它们都将起作用：

trans-unit.source: If this parameter is omitted, insertRow() inserts a new row at the last position in Internet Explorer and at the first position in Chrome and Safari.
trans-unit.target: 如果省略此参数，则 insertRow() 在Internet Explorer的最后一个位置以及Chrome和Safari的第一个位置插入一个新行。

trans-unit.source: So things have changed ever since @Luke Bennett answered this question. Here is an update.
trans-unit.target: 自从@Luke Bennett回答了这个问题以来，情况就发生了变化。这是更新。

trans-unit.source: So yes your example code is acceptable and will work fine with jQuery 1.4+. ;)
trans-unit.target: 所以你的例子代码是可以接受的,在jQuery 1.4+中也能正常工作。)

trans-unit.source: Such as:
trans-unit.target: 如:

trans-unit.source: The $('<some-tag>') thing in jQuery is a tag object that can have several attr attributes that can be set and get, as well as text, which represents the text between the tag here: <tag>text</tag>.
trans-unit.target: jQuery中的 $('<some-tag>') 东西是一个标签对象，可以具有几个可以设置和获取的 attr 属性，以及 text ，它表示此处 <tag>text</tag> 之间的文本：<tag> text < / tag>。

trans-unit.source: The first and last keywords work on the first or last tag to be started, not closed. Therefore, this plays nicer with nested tables, if you don't want the nested table to be changed, but instead add to the overall table. At least, this is what I found.
trans-unit.target: 在 first 和 last 在第一个或最后一个标记关键字工作启动，没有关闭。因此，如果您不希望更改嵌套表，而是将其添加到整个表中，则此方法对于嵌套表会更好。至少，这是我发现的。

trans-unit.source: The approach you suggest is not guaranteed to give you the result you're looking for - what if you had a tbody for example:
trans-unit.target: 您建议的方法并不能保证能为您提供所需的结果-例如，如果您有 tbody 怎么办：

trans-unit.source: The extra row is added after the 5th row, or at the end of the table if there are less then 5 rows.
trans-unit.target: 在第5行之后添加额外的行,如果少于5行,则在表的末尾添加。

trans-unit.target: 这可以使用jQuery的 "last()"函数轻松完成。

trans-unit.source: You can cache the footer variable and reduce access to DOM (Note: may be it will be better to use a fake row instead of footer).
trans-unit.target: 你可以缓存footer变量,减少对DOM的访问(注意:可能用假行代替footer会更好)。

trans-unit.source: You can include anything within the after() method as long as it's valid HTML, including multiple rows as per the example above.
trans-unit.target: 您可以在 after() 方法中包含任何内容，只要它是有效的HTML，就可以包含上面示例中的多行。

trans-unit.source: You can use this great jQuery add table row function. It works great with tables that have <tbody> and that don't. Also it takes into the consideration the colspan of your last table row.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用此出色的jQuery添加表行功能。对于具有 <tbody> 且没有的表，它非常有用。此外，它还考虑了最后一个表格行的colspan。

trans-unit.source: jQuery has a built-in facility to manipulate DOM elements on the fly.
trans-unit.target: jQuery有一个内置的设施来操纵DOM元素的飞行。

trans-unit.source: jQuery since version 1.4(?) automatically detects if the element you are trying to insert (using any of the append(), prepend(), before(), or after() methods) is a <tr> and inserts it into the first <tbody> in your table or wraps it into a new <tbody> if one doesn't exist.
trans-unit.target: 自版本1.4（？）起，jQuery自动检测您尝试插入的元素（使用 append() ， prepend() ， before() 或 after() 方法）是否为 <tr> 并将其插入到表中的第一个 <tbody> 或将其包装到新的 <tbody> 中(如果不存在的话）。

trans-unit.target: 会将新行添加到表的第一个 TBODY 中，而无需依赖于任何 THEAD 或 TFOOT 。（我没有从存在此行为的jQuery .append() 版本中找到信息。）
